name: Keqing
title: Driving Thunder
description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue â€” but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder.
description.1: When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.
description.4: Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.
description.5: Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.
description.8: If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
9: If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro>. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro>.
description.11: "Humans are like moths, endlessly chasing the flame we call gods and adepti. But this light that I have here is my own."

description.0: Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> in an AOE.
description.1: She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of <electro>Electro DMG</electro>. The final attack deals massive <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro>.
description.3: The swiftest technique in Keqing's personal arsenal is fast enough to bring stars crashing down.

description.0: After recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an Electro Infusion for 5s.
When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.
When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.
Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by <electro>Electro</electro>, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
description.1: This effect can only occur once every 5s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
For 10s after Keqing triggers an <electro>Electro-related Elemental Reaction</electro>, her ATK is increased by 25%.
Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% <electro>Electro DMG Bonus</electro> for 8s.
description.1: Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.
